SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.proxy

Interface ApplianceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlarmSystem, Appliance, ApplianceProxy, Blinds, CoffeeMachine, Door, Fridge, HeatingSystem, LightningSystem, PetFeeder, Ventilation, WateringSystem
public interface ApplianceInterface
Interface defining the essential methods for interacting with an appliance. Used by the ApplianceProxy to implement controlled access and delegation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getName()
    Gets the name of the appliance.
    Room
    getRoom()
    Gets the room where the appliance is located.
    boolean
    isAvailable()
    Checks if the appliance is currently available for use (i.e., not broken).
    void
    repair()
    Repairs the appliance, resetting its state and lifetime.
    void
    resetWasUsedThisTick()
    Resets the usage flag at the start of a new simulation tick.
    void
    setUsedThisTick(boolean wasUsedThisTick)
    Sets a flag indicating whether the appliance was used in the current simulation tick.
    void
    turnOff()
    Turns the appliance off.
    void
    turnOn()
    Turns the appliance on.
    void
    updatePowerUsageAndLifetime()
    Updates the appliance's power consumption and checks for breakage based on usage lifetime.
    void
    use()
    Uses the appliance (performs its primary function).

    • turnOn

      Turns the appliance on.

    • turnOff

      void turnOff()
      Turns the appliance off.

    • use

      void use()
      Uses the appliance (performs its primary function).

    • repair

      void repair()
      Repairs the appliance, resetting its state and lifetime.

    • isAvailable

      boolean isAvailable()
      Checks if the appliance is currently available for use (i.e., not broken).
      Returns:
      true if available, false otherwise.

    • updatePowerUsageAndLifetime

      void updatePowerUsageAndLifetime()
      Updates the appliance's power consumption and checks for breakage based on usage lifetime.

    • setUsedThisTick

      void setUsedThisTick(boolean wasUsedThisTick)
      Sets a flag indicating whether the appliance was used in the current simulation tick.
      Parameters:
      wasUsedThisTick - The new state of the usage flag.

    • resetWasUsedThisTick

      void resetWasUsedThisTick()
      Resets the usage flag at the start of a new simulation tick.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Gets the name of the appliance.
      Returns:
      The appliance's name.

    • getRoom

      Room getRoom()
      Gets the room where the appliance is located.
      Returns:
      The Room object.
